Articles.Content:
Good day gentlemen

I want to do more KPS related Videos on my New channel made for SMP  (Special Mission Projects) and Kerbal but I'm out of gas sort of speak and not very good as let's plays and need some tips on how to get started see what you guys think I shod do. Ideas tips and tricks. I'm doing a SMP Story line and test videos along with lets plays later on and showcasing crafts.

Here my 2nd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCF-8rQVemoyDN8HdNZ908YA

I'm not doing this for any kind of gene  its for fun and because I want to share my stuff with everyone.

all are welcome.

SMP "The Dusken Rebillion" intro video"

https://gaming.youtube.com/watch?v=LFL7rhQWElE&feature=share

Edited March 12, 2017 by Reason

I'm be relseing a new video with in a few days on my new channel your welcome to drop by and take a look.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCF-8rQVemoyDN8HdNZ908YA
Here my Frist new video! I'm a little Embarrassed about how it turned out but will try and do better, Please let me know what you think and share your ideas for not projects and such.
